data.persona: We steal horses. It's the most lucrative haul other than gold. It's not hard to resell them either.
data.description:
You are in the Stable.
A plain wooden building with some hanging tapestries.  There are some handsome looking horses that reside here along with some farm equipment stored inside.
There's a hay, a horse tack, and a hanging tapestry here.
The horse and the royal family are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the royal family band the horse
data.mid_motivation: I plan to steal the horse when the royal family is unawares later today
data.long_motivation: I hope to sell the horse in a few weeks at the neighbouring region
